New Records: This was Bangladesh's first ever win in the second round of a T20 World Cup.
Key Match Events: Taskin Ahmed produced career best figures of 4/25.
Bangladesh dismissed the Netherlands for 135 in 20 overs.
Bangladesh effected two run outs of Max O'Dowd and Tom Cooper inside the Power Play.
Shakib Al Hasan removed Scott Edwards with a delivery going down the leg side.
Hasan Mahmud returned with figures of 4-1-15-2.
Van Meekeren dismissed Soumya Sarkar inside the Power Play.
Mosaddek Hossain scored 20 not out off 12 balls.
Shariz Ahmed took the wicket of Shakib Al Hasan.
Tim Pringle returned with figures of 2-0-10-1.
Miscellaneous Highlights: Rain briefly interrupted play after Bangladesh slipped to 63/4 in the 10th over.
